KnowledgeBase.Title: arithmetic
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: addi divi muli subi iadd isub imul idiv nadd ndiv nmul nsub add1 sub1
KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords: number arithmetic addition subtraction multiplication division operators

Brief.Overview: The arithmetic functions are / (divide), * (multiply), - (subtract), and + (add). The arithmetic functions are will accept 2 or more Numbers (all Number Native Types such as Number, Percent, Money) as arguments. The arguments are process starting from the leftmost and moving to the rightmost.
Brief.Usage: Use the arithmetic functions to multiply, divide, add or subtract two or more numbers.

Syntax.Return: Returns the result of the arithmetic operation.
